item.title: Xcode 编译applealc出现签名错误的解决方法
item.description: ##报错如下 In subcomponent: /Users/admin/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/AppleALC-fqueikknxpxowubueomyyxuwlnmg/Build/Products/Debug/AppleALC.kext/Contents/PlugIns/PinConfigs.kext/Contents/Info.plist.md5 Command CodeSign failed with a nonzero exit code ##解决方法 在Other Code Signing Flags添加参数–deep
